QuestData.Title: Vengeful Heart
QuestData.Description: These are the naga that took our people. I only need one to interrogate, kill the rest.$B$BShow no mercy, $c, for they would surely show us none.
QuestData.CompletionText: These naga have ignited a fire in me that is not easily quenched.
QuestData.RewardText: Good to have a real warrior at my side. Too often, my shaman brethren can't seem to stomach the work.
